Item.name: NoInit
Item.description: No initialization (start values are used as guess values with fixed=false)

Item.name: SteadyState
Item.description: Steady state initialization (derivatives of states are zero)

Item.name: InitialOutput
Item.description: Initialization with initial outputs (and steady state of the states if possible)

ScalarVariable.name: epochOffset
ScalarVariable.description: The time at the start of the simulation as Epoch in s

ScalarVariable.name: fileName
ScalarVariable.description: The path to the .mat-file containing _all_ parameter values

ScalarVariable.name: temperature
ScalarVariable.description: The temperature at the plant's site (optional input)

ScalarVariable.name: windSpeed
ScalarVariable.description: The wind speed at the plant's site (optional input)

ScalarVariable.name: powerDC
ScalarVariable.description: The generated power on the DC side

ScalarVariable.name: totalEnergyDC
ScalarVariable.description: The generated energy on the DC side

ScalarVariable.name: angleOfIncidence
ScalarVariable.description: The angle of incidence between surface normal and sun beam

ScalarVariable.name: irradianceTemperatureWindSpeed2Power.epochOffset
ScalarVariable.description: The time at the start of the simulation as Epoch in s

ScalarVariable.name: irradianceTemperatureWindSpeed2Power.constInverterEfficiency
ScalarVariable.description: Constant overall efficiency of the DC-AC converter

ScalarVariable.name: irradianceTemperatureWindSpeed2Power.location.elevation
ScalarVariable.description: Height above sea level (elevation) in metres

ScalarVariable.name: irradianceTemperatureWindSpeed2Power.plantRecord.panelArea
ScalarVariable.description: Overall surface area of all panels (combined)

ScalarVariable.name: irradianceTemperatureWindSpeed2Power.plantRecord.T_cell_ref
ScalarVariable.description: PV cell temperature at reference conditions (usually STC)

ScalarVariable.name: irradianceTemperatureWindSpeed2Power.plantRecord.panelTilt
ScalarVariable.description: Surface tilt in degree (Horizontal equals 0°, vertical equals 90°)

ScalarVariable.name: irradianceTemperatureWindSpeed2Power.plantRecord.panelAzimuth
ScalarVariable.description: Surface azimuth in degree (South equals 0°, positive towards east)

ScalarVariable.name: irradianceTemperatureWindSpeed2Power.plantRecord.environmentAlbedo
ScalarVariable.description: Albedo for isotropic estimation of irradiance by reflection

ScalarVariable.name: irradianceTemperatureWindSpeed2Power.plantRecord.nsModule
ScalarVariable.description: Number of series connected modules (PhotoVoltaicsLib only)

ScalarVariable.name: irradianceTemperatureWindSpeed2Power.plantRecord.npModule
ScalarVariable.description: Number of parallel connected modules (PhotoVoltaicsLib only)

ScalarVariable.name: irradianceTemperatureWindSpeed2Power.plantModel.epochOffset
ScalarVariable.description: The time at the start of the simulation as Epoch in s

ScalarVariable.name: irradianceTemperatureWindSpeed2Power.plantModel.constTemperature
ScalarVariable.description: Fixed environment temperature if useTemperatureInput = false

ScalarVariable.name: irradianceTemperatureWindSpeed2Power.plantModel.constWindSpeed
ScalarVariable.description: Fixed wind speed value if useWindSpeedInput = false

ScalarVariable.name: irradianceTemperatureWindSpeed2Power.plantModel.elevation
ScalarVariable.description: Height above sea level (elevation) in metres

ScalarVariable.name: irradianceTemperatureWindSpeed2Power.plantModel.arrayTilt
ScalarVariable.description: Array tilt in degree (horizontal equals 0°, vertical equals 90°)

ScalarVariable.name: irradianceTemperatureWindSpeed2Power.plantModel.arrayAzimuth
ScalarVariable.description: Array azimuth in degree (South equals 0°, positive towards east)

ScalarVariable.name: irradianceTemperatureWindSpeed2Power.plantModel.panelArea
ScalarVariable.description: Overall surface area of all panels (combined)

ScalarVariable.name: irradianceTemperatureWindSpeed2Power.plantModel.T_cell_ref
ScalarVariable.description: PV cell temperature at reference conditions (usually STC)

ScalarVariable.name: irradianceTemperatureWindSpeed2Power.plantModel.temperature
ScalarVariable.description: The temperature at the plant's site (optional input)

ScalarVariable.name: irradianceTemperatureWindSpeed2Power.plantModel.powerDC
ScalarVariable.description: The generated power on the DC side

ScalarVariable.name: irradianceTemperatureWindSpeed2Power.plantModel.inclinationAndShadowing.arrayTilt
ScalarVariable.description: Array tilt in degree (horizontal equals 0°, vertical equals 90°)

ScalarVariable.name: irradianceTemperatureWindSpeed2Power.plantModel.inclinationAndShadowing.arrayAzimuth
ScalarVariable.description: Array azimuth in degree (South equals 0°, positive towards west)

ScalarVariable.name: irradianceTemperatureWindSpeed2Power.plantModel.inclinationAndShadowing.diffuseInclinedIrradiance
ScalarVariable.description: Diffuse irradiance on arbitrarily oriented surface

ScalarVariable.name: irradianceTemperatureWindSpeed2Power.plantModel.inclinationAndShadowing.directInclinedIrradiance
ScalarVariable.description: Direct irradiance on arbitrarily oriented surface

ScalarVariable.name: irradianceTemperatureWindSpeed2Power.plantModel.inclinationAndShadowing.reflectedInclinedIrradiance
ScalarVariable.description: Irradiance due to reflection on arbitrarily oriented surface

ScalarVariable.name: irradianceTemperatureWindSpeed2Power.plantModel.inclinationAndShadowing.solarAzimuth
ScalarVariable.description: The azimuth angle of the sun

ScalarVariable.name: irradianceTemperatureWindSpeed2Power.plantModel.inclinationAndShadowing.solarZenith
ScalarVariable.description: The zenith angle of the sun

ScalarVariable.name: irradianceTemperatureWindSpeed2Power.plantModel.inclinationAndShadowing.angleOfIncidence
ScalarVariable.description: The angle of incidence between surface normal and sun beam

ScalarVariable.name: irradianceTemperatureWindSpeed2Power.plantModel.inclinationAndShadowing.angleOfIncidenceAsBlock.angleOfIncidence
ScalarVariable.description: Angle of incidence between surface normal and sun beam

ScalarVariable.name: irradianceTemperatureWindSpeed2Power.plantModel.inclinationAndShadowing.angleOfIncidenceAsBlock.arrayAzimuthSolarCS
ScalarVariable.description: Array azimuth in the same coordinate system as the sun's position

ScalarVariable.name: irradianceTemperatureWindSpeed2Power.plantModel.inclinationAndShadowing.diffusePerez.zen
ScalarVariable.description: Zenith angle of the sun beam

ScalarVariable.name: irradianceTemperatureWindSpeed2Power.plantModel.inclinationAndShadowing.diffusePerez.incAng
ScalarVariable.description: Solar incidence angle on the surface

ScalarVariable.name: irradianceTemperatureWindSpeed2Power.plantModel.inclinationAndShadowing.diffusePerez.HGroDifTil
ScalarVariable.description: Hemispherical diffuse solar irradiation on a tilted surface from the ground

ScalarVariable.name: irradianceTemperatureWindSpeed2Power.plantModel.inclinationAndShadowing.diffusePerez.HSkyDifTil
ScalarVariable.description: Hemispherical diffuse solar irradiation on a tilted surface from the sky

ScalarVariable.name: irradianceTemperatureWindSpeed2Power.plantModel.inclinationAndShadowing.briCoe.zen
ScalarVariable.description: Zenith angle of the sun beam

ScalarVariable.name: irradianceTemperatureWindSpeed2Power.plantModel.inclinationAndShadowing.briCoe.skyCle
ScalarVariable.description: Sky clearness. skyCle=1: overcast sky; skyCle=8 clear sky

ScalarVariable.name: irradianceTemperatureWindSpeed2Power.plantModel.inclinationAndShadowing.from_deg.u
ScalarVariable.description: Connector of Real input signal to be converted

ScalarVariable.name: irradianceTemperatureWindSpeed2Power.plantModel.inclinationAndShadowing.from_deg.y
ScalarVariable.description: Connector of Real output signal containing input signal u in another unit

ScalarVariable.name: irradianceTemperatureWindSpeed2Power.plantModel.inclinationAndShadowing.skyCle.zen
ScalarVariable.description: Zenith angle of the sun beam

ScalarVariable.name: irradianceTemperatureWindSpeed2Power.plantModel.inclinationAndShadowing.skyCle.skyCle
ScalarVariable.description: Sky clearness. skyCle=1: overast sky; skyCle=8: clear sky

ScalarVariable.name: irradianceTemperatureWindSpeed2Power.plantModel.inclinationAndShadowing.relAirMas.zen
ScalarVariable.description: Zenith angle of the sun beam

ScalarVariable.name: irradianceTemperatureWindSpeed2Power.plantModel.plantIrradianceNormal.T
ScalarVariable.description: Fixed device temperature if useHeatPort = false

ScalarVariable.name: irradianceTemperatureWindSpeed2Power.plantModel.plantIrradianceNormal.heatPort.Q_flow
ScalarVariable.description: Heat flow rate (positive if flowing from outside into the component)

ScalarVariable.name: irradianceTemperatureWindSpeed2Power.plantModel.plantIrradianceNormal.I_G_normal
ScalarVariable.description: Total irradiance normal to module surface

ScalarVariable.name: irradianceTemperatureWindSpeed2Power.plantModel.plantIrradianceNormal.angleOfIncidence
ScalarVariable.description: Angle between direct beam and surface normal

ScalarVariable.name: irradianceTemperatureWindSpeed2Power.plantModel.plantIrradianceNormal.A_PV
ScalarVariable.description: The total area of the PV modules

ScalarVariable.name: irradianceTemperatureWindSpeed2Power.plantModel.plantIrradianceNormal.a
ScalarVariable.description: Irradiance losses according to Heydenreich et al. (2008, equation 3); parameter a

ScalarVariable.name: irradianceTemperatureWindSpeed2Power.plantModel.plantIrradianceNormal.b
ScalarVariable.description: Irradiance losses according to Heydenreich et al. (2008, equation 3); parameter b

ScalarVariable.name: irradianceTemperatureWindSpeed2Power.plantModel.plantIrradianceNormal.c
ScalarVariable.description: Irradiance losses according to Heydenreich et al. (2008, equation 3); parameter c

ScalarVariable.name: irradianceTemperatureWindSpeed2Power.plantModel.plantIrradianceNormal.T_cell_ref
ScalarVariable.description: PV cell temperature at reference conditions (usually STC)

ScalarVariable.name: irradianceTemperatureWindSpeed2Power.plantModel.plantIrradianceNormal.U_0
ScalarVariable.description: Heat loss coefficient of the PV module

ScalarVariable.name: irradianceTemperatureWindSpeed2Power.plantModel.plantIrradianceNormal.U_1
ScalarVariable.description: Wind dependent heat loss coefficient of the PV module

ScalarVariable.name: irradianceTemperatureWindSpeed2Power.plantModel.plantIrradianceNormal.G
ScalarVariable.description: Global irradiance on the PV array plane

ScalarVariable.name: irradianceTemperatureWindSpeed2Power.plantModel.plantIrradianceNormal.performanceRatioIrradiance
ScalarVariable.description: Instantaneous performance ratio due to irradiance losses

ScalarVariable.name: irradianceTemperatureWindSpeed2Power.plantModel.plantIrradianceNormal.performanceRatioTemperature
ScalarVariable.description: Instantaneous performance ratio to account for temperature dependency

ScalarVariable.name: irradianceTemperatureWindSpeed2Power.plantModel.plantIrradianceNormal.performanceRatioIAM
ScalarVariable.description: Instantaneous performance ratio due to incidence angle losses

ScalarVariable.name: irradianceTemperatureWindSpeed2Power.plantModel.plantIrradianceNormal.physicalIAMmodel.n
ScalarVariable.description: Refraction index of the cover glass

ScalarVariable.name: irradianceTemperatureWindSpeed2Power.plantModel.plantIrradianceNormal.physicalIAMmodel.angleOfIncidence
ScalarVariable.description: Angle between direct beam and surface normal

ScalarVariable.name: irradianceTemperatureWindSpeed2Power.plantModel.plantIrradianceNormal.physicalIAMmodel.incidenceAngleModifier
ScalarVariable.description: Incident angle modifier for a given angle

ScalarVariable.name: irradianceTemperatureWindSpeed2Power.plantModel.plantIrradianceNormal.physicalIAMmodel.tauZero
ScalarVariable.description: Transmittance when normal to the sun

ScalarVariable.name: irradianceTemperatureWindSpeed2Power.plantModel.integrator.initType
ScalarVariable.description: Type of initialization (1: no init, 2: steady state, 3,4: initial output)

ScalarVariable.name: irradianceTemperatureWindSpeed2Power.plantModel.integrator.y_start
ScalarVariable.description: Initial or guess value of output (= state)

ScalarVariable.name: irradianceTemperatureWindSpeed2Power.plantModel.solarAzimuth.simu_start_epochs
ScalarVariable.description: Offset between simulation time and unix time (epochs), default 01/01/2014

ScalarVariable.name: irradianceTemperatureWindSpeed2Power.plantModel.solarZenith.simu_start_epochs
ScalarVariable.description: Offset between simulation time and unix time (epochs), default 01/01/2014

ScalarVariable.name: irradianceTemperatureWindSpeed2Power.plantModel.environmentTemperature.port.Q_flow
ScalarVariable.description: Heat flow rate (positive if flowing from outside into the component)

ScalarVariable.description: The wind speed at the plant's site (optional input)

ScalarVariable.description: The angle of incidence between surface normal and sun beam

ScalarVariable.description: Gain value multiplied with input signal

ScalarVariable.description: Constant overall efficiency of the DC-AC converter
